{"id":"d460adfb-7d7a-4944-922c-3cab606a1eaf","name":"Update MainTabRoute to use Icons.filled instead of drawables","timestamp":1751705518073,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
<additional_data>
Below are some potentially helpful/relevant pieces of information for figuring out to respond
<attached_files>
<file_contents>
```kotlin:app/src/main/java/umc/hackathon/core/navigation/MainTabRoute.kt, lines=ALL(1-17)
package umc.hackathon.core.navigation

import androidx.annotation.DrawableRes
import androidx.annotation.StringRes
import umc.hackathon.R

enum class MainTabRoute(
 val route: String,
 @StringRes val label: Int,
 @DrawableRes val selectedIcon: Int,
 @DrawableRes val unselectedIcon: Int
) {
 Home("home", R.string.home, R.drawable.ic_home_filled, R.drawable.ic_home_outlined),
 Search("search", R.string.search, R.drawable.ic_search_filled, R.drawable.ic_search_outlined),
 Mypage("mypage", R.string.mypage, R.drawable.ic_mypage_filled, R.drawable.ic_mypage_outlined);
}

```
</file_contents>

</attached_files>
</additional_data>
<user_query>
@MainTabRoute.kt 
drawable 말고 Icons.filled 로 알잘딱 고쳐줘
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"사용자가 MainTabRoute.kt 파일에서 drawable 리소스 대신 Icons.filled를 사용하도록 요청했습니다. 현재 파일을 보면 enum에서 @DrawableRes 어노테이션과 함께 R.drawable.* 리소스들을 사용하고 있는데, 이를 Material Icons의 Icons.filled로 바꿔달라는 것 같습니다.

먼저 파일을 확인해보고, 적절한 Material Icons로 변경해야겠습니다.

현재 아이콘들:
- Home: ic_home_filled, ic_home_outlined
- Search: ic_search_filled, ic_search_outlined 
- Mypage: ic_mypage_filled, ic_mypage_outlined

이를 Icons.filled와 Icons.outlined로 변경해야겠습니다.","signature":""},{"type":"text","text":""}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01A1JcjLQZP3DK7X7pCNefXL","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/src/main/java/umc/hackathon/core/navigation/MainTabRoute.kt", "instructions": "I will replace drawable resources with Material Icons using Icons.filled and Icons.outlined, and update the data types accordingly.", "code_edit": "package umc.hackathon.core.navigation\n\nimport androidx.annotation.StringRes\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Home\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Person\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Search\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.outlined.Home\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.outlined.Person\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.outlined.Search\nimport androidx.compose.ui.graphics.vector.ImageVector\nimport umc.hackathon.R\n\nenum class MainTabRoute(\n val route: String,\n @StringRes val label: Int,\n val selectedIcon: ImageVector,\n val unselectedIcon: ImageVector\n) {\n Home(\"home\", R.string.home, Icons.Filled.Home, Icons.Outlined.Home),\n Search(\"search\", R.string.search, Icons.Filled.Search, Icons.Outlined.Search),\n Mypage(\"mypage\", R.string.mypage, Icons.Filled.Person, Icons.Outlined.Person);\n}"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01A1JcjLQZP3DK7X7pCNefXL","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

```
@@ -1,6 +1,13 @@
 package umc.hackathon.core.navigation
 
-import androidx.annotation.DrawableRes
 import androidx.annotation.StringRes
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Home
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Person
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Search
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.outlined.Home
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.outlined.Person
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.outlined.Search
+import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.vector.ImageVector
 import umc.hackathon.R
 
@@ -8,10 +15,10 @@
 val route: String,
 @StringRes val label: Int,
- @DrawableRes val selectedIcon: Int,
- @DrawableRes val unselectedIcon: Int
+ val selectedIcon: ImageVector,
+ val unselectedIcon: ImageVector,
 ) {
- Home("home", R.string.home, R.drawable.ic_home_filled, R.drawable.ic_home_outlined),
- Search("search", R.string.search, R.drawable.ic_search_filled, R.drawable.ic_search_outlined),
- Mypage("mypage", R.string.mypage, R.drawable.ic_mypage_filled, R.drawable.ic_mypage_outlined);
+ Home("home", R.string.home, Icons.Filled.Home, Icons.Outlined.Home),
+ Search("search", R.string.search, Icons.Filled.Search, Icons.Outlined.Search),
+ Mypage("mypage", R.string.mypage, Icons.Filled.Person, Icons.Outlined.Person);
 }
 
```

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"완료했습니다! drawable 리소스를 Material Icons의 Icons.Filled와 Icons.Outlined로 변경했습니다. 

주요 변경사항:
- `@DrawableRes Int` → `ImageVector` 타입으로 변경
- Home, Search, Person(Mypage) 아이콘을 Material Icons로 교체
- 필요한 import 문 추가"}]}]}
